name: The Kate Shepard House Bed and Breakfast

reviews.title: My favorite B&B stay ever!
reviews.text: I have never posted a review before, but having just returned from a wonderful stay at the Kate Shepard House, I felt compelled to write.

reviews.title: Tranquil simplicity
reviews.text: I have stayed in many bed and breakfasts, and am a frequent business and personal traveller. My two-night stay at the Kate Shepard House was truly unparalleled.

description: Built in 1897, listed on National Historic Register, this Queen Anne home is located in historic neighborhood perfect for walks with 100 year old Oak and Magnolia trees shading the sidewalks. Close to antique shops, downtown activities, Carnival Cruise Terminal, Bellingrath Gardens and beautiful gulf coast beaches. A full southern breakfast is served.
